title: Social Media Manager and Len Gen Specialist
job_overview:
This is an exciting opportunity to partner with our Catholic group coaching company in a social media/led gen capacity.

About Our Company
We are a faith-based coaching organization dedicated to helping individuals grow in their spiritual journey and personal development through the lens of Catholic teachings. Our mission is to provide guidance, community, and resources that help people deepen their relationship with God while achieving their personal and professional goals.

Project Overview
We're seeking a passionate social media manager to join our mission-driven team. We need someone who can authentically build an online presence from scratch. This role offers the opportunity to make a meaningful impact by reaching people at various stages of their faith journey through engaging social media content.

Your role: Become the voice of our brand across social platforms, creating content that inspires and educates.

What We're Looking For
Create and schedule posts everyday (TikTok, Instagram and Facebook)
Create written/video content that aligns with our Catholic values and coaching mission
Engage with your audience and respond to comments/messages with warmth and authenticity
Track basic analytics to help improve performance and reach
Support lead generation tasks (DUpgrade to see actual infossages and community building)

What We Offer
Collaborative partnership with a mission-driven organization
Opportunity to contribute to meaningful work that impacts lives
Fair compensation for quality work
Flexibility in timeline and communication
Clear brand direction and messaging guidelines
Supportive team environment rooted in Catholic values

Next Steps
If this opportunity resonates with you and aligns with your values and expertise, I would love to discuss the project further.

Please respond with a video about you and your work - I'd love to get to know you and see your passion for what you do!

If it's a good fit, we can set up a time to talk and I'll share our brand guidelines and content strategy with you.

Blessings,
Joe
